# wup-layout

## Properties

| Property      | Attribute      | Description                                   | Type                       | Default     |
| ------------- | -------------- | --------------------------------------------- | -------------------------- | ----------- |
| `columns`     | `columns`      | The actual data of the layout.                | `number`                   | `12`        |
| `customStyle` | `custom-style` | Custom style to be passed to the component.   | `string`                   | `undefined` |
| `data`        | --             | The actual data of the layout.                | `ComponentLayoutElement[]` | `undefined` |
| `horizontal`  | `horizontal`   | When set to true forces an horizontal layout. | `boolean`                  | `false`     |
